name: scrum-poker-monorepo
description: Real-time Scrum Poker Planning - Monorepo with Frontend and Backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || echo 'No lint script in backend'
scripts.deploy:backend: echo 'Backend deploys automatically via Render webhook'
